description:
More quirky clients visit RPG Real Estate to find new homes. Meanwhile, the random attacks by the mysterious and elusive dragon continues.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoe!? Uranai de Unmei no Heya, Mitsukarimasuka!?
Wha!? Finding a Dream Home Through Fortune Telling!?
ほえ!? 占いで運命の部屋, 見つかりますか!?
